title: Help identifying this typeface
content:
Could anyone help identify the typeface used for the word submit on the attached photo.  
Or any equivalent in similar style?  
Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820015845im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BRITISH_RECIPE_SUBMIT_MISSFOODWISE_BRITISH_FOOD_3929.jpg)
author: creativeliz

comments.content: Look at the various Bodoni's; Poster or Ultra Bodoni Italic is very close but not exact.

Please post in the applicable forum:

[http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820015845/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")
